alert.note: Alert for Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 24 at 2:46PM MDT until October 25 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 10 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 19 expected. * WHERE...Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 10 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin
